DOC.detailed_description: This open-label , ascending-dose study XMT-1107 administer intravenously 90 minute every 21 day ( 1 cycle ) . Blood sample PK analysis perform immediately prior dose dosing . Adverse event grade accord National Cancer Institute ( NCI ) Common Terminology Criteria ( CTC ) version 4.0 ( CTCAE v4.0 )
